**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 138 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 120 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** varies --- You alter a creature's shadow, transforming it into a terrifying monster out to devour the creature. The creature must attempt a Will save. A creature that has the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition from _unspeakable shadow_ must spend at least one of its actions each turn to either attack its shadow (making a Strike ineffectually) or flee from its shadow (using one action to move away as though it had the [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) condition). **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is frightened 2.
**Failure** The target is frightened 3. It can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** The target is so afraid, it might instantly die. It must succeed at a Fortitude save or die; this saving throw has the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait. If it succeeds at its save, the target is frightened 4 and can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.
name: Unspeakable Shadow
